name: Customize for Chelse!
description: Welcome Chelse to Ha Noi. This trip is for your special days in Ha Noi and Ha Long Bay. Let's enjoy your short Journey to Ha Long with beautiful beach and the feeling of relaxed. We are confident that The blue ocean and the marvelous sightseeing will satisfy you in Ha Long and one day of exploring Ha Noi-our peaceful city, you will experience the life of Ha Noi with its typical culture, the relics reminded of a Heroic Ha Noi. Enjoy a day as a real Hanoian!
